abilities.name: Energy Evolution
abilities.effect: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Quick Draw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.
